# supportsSessionPreset(_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether you can use the device with capture session configured with the specified preset.

## Declaration

```swift
func supportsSessionPreset(_ preset: AVCaptureSession.Preset) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **preset**: A capture session preset.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if you can use the device; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Inspecting device characteristics

- **isVirtualDevice**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the device consists of two or more physical devices.
- **constituentDevices**: An array of physical devices that make up a virtual device.
- **hasMediaType(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the device captures media of a particular type.
- **transportType**: The transport type of the device.
